title: For the purpose of this Regulation, the carpet areas for EWS, LIG or MIG tenements shall be as determined by the Government in the Housing Department from time to time
clause_text: For the purpose of this Regulation, the carpet areas for EWS, LIG or MIG tenements shall be as determined by the Government in the Housing Department from time to time.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
